description: Section 73 application to vary wording of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission P092375 dated 21/03/2011 for a 59 bed apart-hotel, maintaining employment space on the ground, mezzanine and lower ground levels, incorporating previously approved roof extension and alterations/extension at the rear and to the entrances on the front elevation of the building. The Minor Amendment relates to alterations to internal layouts, alterations to the rear elevation, location of lift overrun and cycle store.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 21/03/2014.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 21/03/2011 [LBI ref: P092375]. Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
